import React from 'react'; import { formatThousands } from '../../helper/formatter'; const InventoryInfo = (props) => { return (
Inventory Info
{' '}
{/*

Total DC

{props.isEdit ? props.editPlanDetails[0] && props.editPlanDetails[0].request_obj && formatThousands(props.editPlanDetails[0].request_obj.totalInDc) : props.totalInDc === 0 ? 0 : formatThousands(props.totalInDc)}
*/}

Store On Hand

{props.isEdit ? props.editPlanDetails[0] && props.editPlanDetails[0].request_obj && formatThousands(props.editPlanDetails[0].request_obj.totalOnHand) : formatThousands(props.totalOnHand)}
{/*

Store On Order

{props.isEdit ? props.editPlanDetails[0] && props.editPlanDetails[0].request_obj && formatThousands(props.editPlanDetails[0].request_obj.totalOnOrder) : formatThousands(props.totalOnOrder)}

Store In Transit

{props.isEdit ? props.editPlanDetails[0] && props.editPlanDetails[0].request_obj && formatThousands(props.editPlanDetails[0].request_obj.totalInTransit) : formatThousands(props.totalInTransit)}
*/}

Stores Selected

{props.isEdit ? props.editPlanDetails[0] && props.editPlanDetails[0].request_obj && props.editPlanDetails[0].request_obj.stores.length : formatThousands(props.selectedStores)} / {props.isEdit ? props.editPlanDetails[0] && props.editPlanDetails[0].request_obj && props.editPlanDetails[0].request_obj.stores.length : formatThousands(props.totalStores)}
{/*
*/} {/*
*/}
{/*

Limit clearance to few stores

*/}
{/*
*/}
); }; export default InventoryInfo;
